articles.author: Photographs by Timothy Fadek/Redux for CNN
articles.title: This nurse makes house calls near Ukraine's front lines
articles.description: Lilia Schwez works as the only nurse in an understaffed and underfunded clinic that serves five villages in eastern Ukraine. She won't abandon the people who count on her.
articles.content:
Nurse Lilia Schwez administers a Covid-19 test to 8-year-old Anhelina Yasinska in eastern Ukraine. Anhelina's mother was concerned about her daughter's fever, but she tested negative for Covid-19.

articles.title: A look inside Mississippi's only critical race theory class and an unlikely ally
articles.description: Three weeks ago, Brittany Murphree enrolled in Law 743, a unique class for the University of Mississippi. Despite the skepticism from fellow Republican friends and family, the second-year law student wanted to take the class "to see what it's all about."
